categories.description: Use this category when the email is asking for information about our company, products, processes, pricing, timelines, legal terms or any other general inquiry that expects a factual explanation or guidance.

Choose this category when the sender is notifying us about progress or changes: signing the agreement, submitting or revising scripts, updating requirements, sharing evaluation results, or any status report that moves an ongoing project forward
Select this category when the email contains compliments, complaints, suggestions, or any qualitative feedback about our service, product, communication or overall experience

parameters.html:
=

Project Update Acknowledgement

Hi {{ $json.from.value[0].name || $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.headers.from.split('<')[0].trim() || 'there' }},

Thank you for your recent update on the project. We’ve reviewed the information you provided and have logged it in our system.

What we received:

  • Signed agreement / contract confirmation.
  • Revised requirements or scope changes.
  • Draft scripts or other deliverables for review.
  • Evaluation results or performance reports.

Next steps:

  • Our team will review the materials and integrate any changes within 2–3 business days.
  • If clarifications are needed, we’ll reach out via email or schedule a quick call.
  • You’ll receive the updated project timeline once the review is complete.

If you have additional files or questions, feel free to reply directly to this email.

We appreciate your prompt communication and look forward to moving the project ahead smoothly.

Best regards,
Sophia Mitchell
Project Coordinator | syncbricks.com
WhatsApp: +1  

© 2025 SyncBricks. All rights reserved.
parameters.subject: =Re: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.subject }}
=Re:  {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.Subject }}

parameters.html:
=

Hi {{ $json.senderName }} <{{ $json.senderEmail }}>,

Thanks for reaching out with your questions. I’d love to cover everything face-to-face.

Location:
123 Main St
Los Angeles, CA 90089

We just sent you three calendar invitations for these time slots:

    {{ $json.slotTimes.map(t => `
  • ${t}
    • `).join('') }}

Click Yes on the invite that works best for you. Google will reserve that slot automatically; the other two will stay open.

If none of the times work, reply with a couple of alternatives and I’ll find something that fits.

Looking forward to meeting you!
— Corvin
parameters.subject: =Re: {{ $json.originalSub }}
